title: 我的世界服务器
author: suosun
txt_content: 现在RPG服务器很受欢迎吗

replies.author: 禁雨断
replies.txt_content: 还好吧，主要是因为生存差不多都毕业好几次了

replies.author: uiluil
replies.txt_content: 我觉得和生存服五五开

replies.author: mohuang521
replies.txt_content: 生存得有好玩的mod

replies.author: mohuang521
replies.txt_content: 而且最好容易上手得感觉

replies.author: mohuang521
replies.txt_content: 不容易上手感觉很累

replies.author: MC_tingfeng
replies.txt_content: 个人不喜欢玩rpg

replies.author: 我去年买了块表
replies.txt_content: rpg很赚钱倒是真的

replies.author: 苏鸠
replies.txt_content: 三个字：刷刷刷

replies.author: NoName德里奇
replies.txt_content: 不是很懂你们RPG玩家.jpg

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content: 好的 用心做的 当然受欢迎  烂大街的就别玩了

replies.author: 南京扛把子
replies.txt_content: 现在已经有把MC完成 网游的了

replies.author: TenmaW
replies.txt_content: RPG和生存各有所长吧，RPG好圈钱这是实话，不过生存能体验的更多一些我是这么感觉的

replies.author: HaoZai
replies.txt_content: RPG我觉得还行 得看你的内容 跟 制作手法

replies.author: XueRe
replies.txt_content: 我感觉小游戏服务器还是比RPG好玩

replies.author: yuen27787231
replies.txt_content: RPG比生存好玩 不計算VIP服

replies.author: 小cheng
replies.txt_content: 什么类型都一样吧，做不好，管理不好，肯定不受欢迎。
和生存55开qwq
不清楚，反正我喜欢qwq

replies.author: 毅毅最酷
replies.txt_content: RPG和生存都可以挺好玩的都

replies.author: TheRam_
replies.txt_content: 我还是去养老生存吧
